name: Beam Boss
description:
!!WARNING!!
THIS GAME IS NSFW
WHILE NOT YET IMPLEMENTED, THE GAME WILL HAVE RAPEY THEMES
YOU ARE PLAYING THE BAD GUY, AFTER ALL
!!END WARNING!!

Click to shoot lazer

Kill enemy to get money

Buy upgrades after beating boss

Click self, then arrow button to fight the strongest available wave

Click captured hero, then arrow button to fight their wave again

Click captured hero, then hearts to go to sex screen

For now just click the button with the weird star ten times, there's no animation and no minigame

Max out hearts to power up your lazer

That's it

That's the game

Also you're naked

Have fun!
